8763.name: Elrokian Trap
8763.description: Trap weapon used on the Primeval Isle. Kabokula

8764.name: Trap Stone
8764.description: A stone used in the Elrokian Trap.

8765.name: Red Gem
8765.description: Shiny red gems collected by Warehouse Chief Klump of Town of Aden. You can play the card game if you bring Klump more than 50 of these gems.

8766.name: Spirit Bead
8766.description: Beads collected by Blacksmith Wilbert of Town of Aden. You can play the game if you bring him more than 50.

8767.name: Tyrannosaurus Claw
8767.description: This claw can be obtained by defeating a Tyrannosaurus.

8768.name: Diary Fragment
8768.description: This is a piece of a missing expedition member's diary. Deliver it to the expedition leader, Captain Marquez.

8769.name: Expedition Member's Letter
8769.description: This is a letter that a missing expedition member sent to his Elrokian friend Kirikachin. Deliver it to Kirikachin.

8770.name: Ornithomimus Claw
8770.description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

8771.name: Deinonychus Bone
8771.description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

8772.name: Pachycephalosaurus Skin
8772.description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

8773.name: Practice Elrokian Trap
8773.description: Take this practice trap, which is necessary for learning a special Elrokian tribal skill, to Kirikachin.

8774.name: Dinosaur Tissue
8774.description: This Dinosaur Tissue is a research ingredient for magicians and Dwarven craftsmen.

8775.name: Dinosaur Egg
8775.description: This Dinosaur Egg is a research ingredient (along with Dinosaur Tissue) for magicians and Dwarven craftsmen.

8776.name: Bones of a Plains Dinosaur
8776.description: This is a research ingredient for Shilen's priests and magicians.

8777.name: Ancient Creatures and How I Long To Be With Them
8777.description: Found in Rune's main library, this book contains information about ancient creatures.

8778.name: Mantarasa Egg
8778.description: This mysterious item can cure any illness. It can be obtained in the Primeval Isle's Lost Nest.

8779.name: Ornithomimus Claw
8779.description: This dinosaur claw can be used by the Elrokian Shaman Karakawei to perform a special ritual.

8780.name: Deinonychus Bone Fragment
8780.description: This dinosaur bone fragment can be used by the Elrokian Shaman Karakawei to perform a special ritual.

8781.name: Epitaph of Wisdom
8781.description: This epitaph can be obtained from the Chuta Kaimu Pillar of Wisdom in the Lost Nest.

8782.name: Gazkh Fragment
8782.description: This is a fragment of the axe Gazkh that Shilen gave to the Elrokian warriors long ago.

8783.name: Bone Powder
8783.description: These ash-like remains of an ancient Elrokian warrior can be obtained after performing a memorial service at the Warrior's Grave.

8784.name: Gazkh
8784.description: This ancient axe, Gazkh, can be reformed by Shilen's Stone Statue. It is necessary to battle Sailren.

8785.name: Dinosaur Fang Necklace
8785.description: This necklace is the mark of the ancient Elrokians who raid the wharf.

8786.name: Primeval Potion
8786.description: Increases Resistance to poison and anesthesia. Primeval Potion

8787.name: Sprigant's Fruit
8787.description: This fruit, dropped by Sprigants, increases Resistance to poison and anesthesia. Primeval Potion

8788.name: Sirra's Blade - Haste
8788.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

8789.name: Sirra's Blade - Health
8789.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

8790.name: Sirra's Blade - Critical Poison
8790.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases the possibility that the target will be poisoned by 15% during a regular critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8791.name: Sword of Ipos - Focus
8791.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

8792.name: Sword of Ipos - Haste
8792.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

8793.name: Sword of Ipos - Health
8793.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

8794.name: Barakiel's Axe - Health
8794.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

8795.name: Barakiel's Axe - Haste
8795.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

8796.name: Barakiel's Axe - Focus
8796.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

8797.name: Behemoth's Tuning Fork - Focus
8797.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

8798.name: Behemoth's Tuning Fork - Health
8798.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

8799.name: Behemoth's Tuning Fork - Anger
8799.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases Max HP by 15% and increases P. Atk. by 32. Enhances damage to target during PvP. Special Ability: Anger
